title: "Neural Color Wallpapers"
content:
Welcome to our website, where you can find a stunning collection of wallpapers featuring simple graphics of neural networks against backgrounds of complementary colors. Our wallpapers are designed to be both aesthetically pleasing and thought-provoking, inspiring creativity and innovation in all who view them.

Whether you're looking for a wallpaper to spruce up your desktop or mobile device, or simply want to explore the beauty of neural networks and color theory, we have something for everyone. Our collection is constantly updated with new designs, so be sure to check back often for fresh inspiration.

With our easy-to-use interface, downloading and setting up your new wallpaper is a breeze. Simply browse our selection, select your favorite design, and download it directly to your device. Our wallpapers are optimized for a variety of screen sizes and resolutions, ensuring that they look great no matter what device you're using.

So why wait? Start exploring our collection today and add some color and creativity to your digital world!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a neural network, against a background of complementary colors."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
